Detailed Description

A packet to send text (and later mabye pictures etc.) via email.

After the usual header the request packet contains:
PosSizeComment
0 2 bytes To address length
2 2 bytes From address length
4 2 bytes Subject length
6 2 bytes The number of optionalheaderlines
8 4 bytes Data length
12string Recipient email address
x To address length The recipient address
x From address length The from address
x Subject length The subject
x Data length The data (body) of the message
x nbroptionalheaderlines*2 strings The optionalheaderlines

Definition at line 39 of file SendEmailPacket.h.

uint16 SendEmailRequestPacket::getAddressLength (   )  const [inline]
 

Get the length of the email address.

Returns:

Definition at line 240 of file SendEmailPacket.h.

Referenced by getDataStartPos().

bool SendEmailRequestPacket::getData (  MC2String &  adr,
MC2String &  fromAdr,
MC2String &  subject,
MC2String &  data,
uint32 &  nbrOptionalHeaders,
char **&  optionalHeaderTypes,
char **&  optionalHeaderValues
)  const
 

Get the main content in this packet.

The strings must be allocated, and at least have the length of the getAddressLength() and getDataLength(), when calling this method, with the exception of optionalHeaderLines that is allocated by this method and must be deleted by caller!

Parameters:
adr The email address of the recipent is copied into this outparameter. Must be allocated by the caller (at least getAddressLength() bytes).
fromAdr The address of the sender of the email. Must be allocated by the caller (at least getFromAddressLength() bytes).
subject The subject of the email. Must be allocated by the caller (at least getSubjectLength() bytes).
data The data that should be sent to the recipent is copied into this outparameter. Must be allocated by the caller (at least getDataLength() bytes).
nbrOptionalHeaders Set to the number of optional header lines.
optionalHeaderTypes Set to a new vector with pointers into the packet, caller must delete vector but not strings.
optionalHeaderValues Set to a new vector with pointers into the packet, caller must delete vector but not strings.
Returns:
True if the values are copied to the outparameters correctly, false otherwise.

Returns:
The length (in bytes, including the last NULL_char) of the datafield in bytes.

bool SendEmailRequestPacket::setData (  const char *  adr,
const char *  fromAdr,
const char *  subj,
const char *  data,
uint32  nbrOptionalHeaders = 0,
const char *const *const   optionalHeaderTypes = NULL,
const char *const *const   optionalHeaderValues = NULL
) 
 

Add content to this packet.

Parameters:
adr The email address of the recipent.
fromAdr The email address in the "from"-field.
subj The subject of the email.
data The data that will be sent to the recipent.
nbrOptionalHeaders The number of headerlines in optionalHeaderTypes and optionalHeaderValues.
optionalHeaderTypes The types of the optional headerlines.
optionalHeaderValues The values of the optional headerlines.
Returns:
True if the values are inserted into the packet, false otherwise.
